summary: A new shield that will bring wonder and anal tearing to a Tamrielic region near you.
descriptionHtml:
STEP UP and grab the first of my new series of armanents and other fantastical pieces of junk: THE MIEK SERIES

Location: The Abandoned Prison (use this coc command if your a lazy: coc abandonedprison01) There the dangerous and cunning Captain Shaggle Nuts awaits a foolish traveler to wander in....

Bugs: Well I heard the stomach bug was going around but I ain't gots it yet.

The face is that of the mighty MIEK. It took much to draw him out into the open: Offers of applesauce and the paste of ground-up gooches were required heavily. Also the corpses of 3892.5 clown penguins.
author: Yo boy ZEYE
